title: China Takes the Spotlight at UKâ€™s First AI Safety Summit to Shape Global AI Governance
description: In a transformative maneuver for AI governance, a senior official from China’s Ministry of Science and Technology leads a delegation to the UK-hosted inaugural Global Artificial Intelligence Safety Summit. The spotlight is on China’s Global AI Governance Initiative, unveiled during the Third Belt and Road Forum for International Cooperation, as the delegation aims to foster ... Read more
